bibl.title: Peter GREEN (Ed.), Hellenistic History and Culture
bibl.note: Lecture delivered at the Symposium on Hellenistic History and Culture, University of Texas at Austin, 20-22 October 1988. - "I have tried to indicate that the ideology of Ptolemaic kingship was most emphatically not one of administration or governorship."
bibl.seg: SAMUEL Alan E., The Ptolemies and the Ideology of Kingship; - Response: Diana DELIA; - Discussion.
Peter GREEN (Ed.), Hellenistic History and Culture = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 9 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - Oxford, 1993) pp. 168-192, fig. 33; - 192-204, fig. 34; - 204-210.
